name: amqplib
notes: AMQP (Advanced Message Queuing Protocol) client library for RabbitMQ. Requires persistent TCP socket connections to message brokers, which doesn't fit Workers' request/response execution model. Also fails with parsing error 'Unexpected token ":"' suggesting bundling/import issues. For message queuing in Workers, use Cloudflare Queues, Pub/Sub, or MQTT brokers compatible with Workers' connection model.
